h1: How Many Calories in a Rib Steak?
assumptions: Grilled ribeye steak (choice grade), moderately trimmed fat, average serving size 200 g, no added sauces or marinades.

quick_answer.text: One 200 g grilled rib steak provides ~582 kcal and ~48 g protein.

faqs.a: About 291 kcal per 100 g grilled ribeye steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one rib steak?
faqs.a: Roughly 48 g protein in a 200 g serving.
